Transformer - based models.from sentence: In this paper , we study the use of Transformer - based models for AS2 and provide effective solutions to tackle the data scarceness problem for AS2 and the instability of the finetuning step .

stability.from sentence: We improve stability of Transformer models by adding an intermediate fine - tuning step , which aims at specializing them to the target task ( AS2 ) , i.e. , this step transfers a pretrained language model to a model for the target task .

transferred model.from sentence: We show that the transferred model can be effectively adapted to the target domain with a subsequent finetuning step , even when using target data of small size .
